text: Mera Vida V1 Pro hai, ek sal ho gaya. Iss scooter main bahat problem hai, bahat bar service kiya hai but problem thik nahi hua. Ekdum bekar scooter hai. Scooter start nahi hotei hai bahat bar, road pe bandh ho jate hai. Handle bar switch bekar hai third class quality hai. Iska LIMP mode suddenly activate hoke Road ke middle me scooter suddenly stop ho jate hai jiske liye accident se bahat bar bach gaya. It's not a scooter, just like a death machine. Never buy Hero Vida electric scooter.
